title: Hot Headz - Roasted Naga Ketchup
comment: Well balanced hotness. Can be used in "Ketchup amounts" without becoming too hot.

title: Encona - Carolina Reaper Sauce
comment: Very nice to mix into other sauce to add a bit of hotness

title: Poppamies - Chipotle Hot Sauce
comment: Smoky taste. No real hotness, but can give a nice taste in some food

title: Encona - Lousiana Cajun
comment: A bit sour. Fits great with e.g. Bolognese

title: Skånsk Chili - Sriracha
comment: Fruity taste. Fantastic with asian food and Pelmeni.

title: Skånsk Chili - Scorpion Inferno
comment: Very hot. Can make anything hot without adding too much taste.

title: Hot Headz - Naga peanuts
comment: A bit hot, but taste is really boring. Normal salted peanuts taste better.

title: Mrs. Renfro's Ghost Pepper Salsa
comment: Hot and tasty. Fits with many things. Excellent with taco. Hotness seems additive: if you eat two tacos with the same amount of salsa, the second one will be way hotter.

title: Poppamies Scotch Bonnet
comment: A bit sour. Works ok with many things, but can't find any food where it really shines.

title: Magnum vit bägare
comment: Very rich in white chocolate, including a chocolate shell on top and bottom, and pieces mixed in with the cream.
